message:
SYSTEM: TalkOEG_Ene2014_LIDER.pdf: Página 25
Challenge 
 
Which extensions to the current LOD are needed 
to support a new generation of large-scale 
content analytics applications that will overcome 
language barriers? 
Identification of new linguistic resources, 
metadata, guidelines, tools, etc. for the LOD 
Linguistic Licensed Linked Data (3LD) 
Specification of a new generation of NLP services 
that are LOD-aware and can exploit LOD   
 
25
speaker: SYSTEM
